title.value: Predictive Inference with Feature Conformal Prediction
title.justification: Extracted directly from the provided paper text
title.quote: P REDICTIVE I NFERENCE WITH F EATURE C ONFORMAL P REDICTION Jiaye Teng1,3,4,∗ , Chuan Wen1,3,4,∗ , Dinghuai Zhang2,∗ ... Published as a conference paper at ICLR 2023

extractions.description: This paper proposes the concept of Feature Conformal Prediction (Feature CP), which extends the conformal prediction technique to semantic feature spaces instead of being limited to the output space. This extension leverages the inductive bias of deep representation learning to achieve better efficiency and effectiveness in predictive inference tasks, such as ImageNet classification and Cityscapes image segmentation.

type.justification: The paper presents experimental results and evaluations on predictive inference benchmarks, including synthetic datasets and real-world tasks like ImageNet classification and Cityscapes image segmentation.
type.quote: From a theoretical perspective, we demonstrate that feature conformal prediction provably outperforms regular conformal prediction under mild assumptions.... Apart from experiments on existing predictive inference benchmarks, we also demonstrate the state-of-the-art performance of the proposed methods on large-scale tasks such as ImageNet classification and Cityscapes image segmentation.

name.justification: The paper focuses on uncertainty quantification techniques using conformal prediction and extends these techniques to feature space.
name.quote: Conformal prediction is a distribution-free technique for establishing valid prediction intervals... In this paper, we propose feature conformal prediction, which extends the scope of conformal prediction to semantic feature spaces by leveraging the inductive bias of deep representation learning.

name.justification: The paper deals with methods and techniques aimed at making predictions and providing uncertainty estimates for these predictions.
name.quote: Conformal prediction is a distribution-free technique for establishing valid prediction intervals... In this paper, we propose feature conformal prediction.

name.justification: The paper demonstrates the application of the proposed methods on ImageNet classification tasks.
name.quote: we also demonstrate the state-of-the-art performance of the proposed methods on large-scale tasks such as ImageNet classification

name.justification: The paper evaluates the methods on Cityscapes image segmentation tasks.
name.quote: we also demonstrate the state-of-the-art performance of the proposed methods on large-scale tasks such as ... Cityscapes image segmentation

name.justification: ResNet-50 is specifically mentioned and used in the experiments for image segmentation.
name.quote: we use the ResNet50 backbone as f and take two convolution layers as g.

is_contributed.justification: ResNet-50 is a well-known pre-existing model and is not a new contribution of this paper.
is_contributed.quote: we use the ResNet50 backbone as f and take two convolution layers as g.

is_executed.justification: The ResNet-50 model was executed as part of the image segmentation experiments.
is_executed.quote: we use the ResNet50 backbone as f and take two convolution layers as g.

is_compared.justification: The performance of the method using ResNet-50 was compared to other baseline methods.
is_compared.quote: Besides, note that vanilla CP cannot return a good group coverage.
